title: Emerald and Diamond Peacock Jhumka - Exquisite Bridal Chandbali (చేయని జుంకాలు)
materials: 22K Gold Plated. High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Faceted Emerald Center Stone. Rhodium plating to prevent tarnishing.
features: Intricately designed peacock motif (Mayura design). Openwork jhumka bell embellished with countless CZs. Delicate filigree detailing showcasing unparalleled craftsmanship. Features a vibrant emerald center stone to catch the light. Handcrafted with traditional Telugu detailing and a modern lightweight design. These jhumkas offer a modern design element while maintaining a sense of South Indian culture.
colors: Gold (bright yellow) with green emerald and sparkling white Cubic Zirconia accents.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham or half-saree functions. Ideal for modern brides looking to blend tradition with contemporary style.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The brilliant sparkle of CZs combined with the rich emerald adds a touch of regal beauty. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear. Crafted with precision and care, guaranteeing exceptional quality and lasting beauty. Symbolizes grace, beauty, and prosperity. The peacock is a symbol of the wealth and prosperity.
